medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports constant pain 'right at my sternum' that began overnight. Nausea started in the morning, associated with food from the night before. Emesis occurred three times, experiencing dry heaves during the third episode. Patient also noted chills and diaphoresis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hemolytic anemia, malaria during World War II, hemorrhoidectomy, hyperlipidemia, bladder cancer treated with BCG, and multiple urinary procedures.
